mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xunwuqishi_id as xunwuqishiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xunwuqishi_liuyan_text as xunwuqishiLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_name as xunwuqishiName ,xunwuqishi.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,xunwuqishi.zhaohuizhuangtai_types as zhaohuizhuangtaiTypes ,xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_photo as xunwuqishiPhoto ,xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_time as xunwuqishiTime ,xunwuqishi.yonghu_id as xunwuqishiYonghuId ,xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_dizhi as xunwuqishiDizhi ,xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_content as xunwuqishiContent ,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM xunwuqishi_liuyan a left JOIN xunwuqishi xunwuqishi ON a.xunwuqishi_id = xunwuqishi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xunwuqishi_id = #{params.xunwuqishiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} or xunwuqishi.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xunwuqishi_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.update_time = #{params.updateTime}
and a.xunwuqishi_id IS NOT NULL
and xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiName},'%')
and xunwuqishi.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and xunwuqishi.zhaohuizhuangtai_types = #{params.zhaohuizhuangtaiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xunwuqishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xunwuqishiTimeEnd})
and a.xunwuqishi_time = #{params.xunwuqishiTime}
and xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiDizhi},'%')
and xunwuqishi.xunwuqishi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
